channel.title: Help me plz
channel.description: hey this is dscimmyownz aka marcus can somone help me make a wep only ofr staff that has a huge bonus or kills somone in 1 hit also can u post the code and tell me where to put it plz it would be a great help[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 05:42:06 PM[/size][hr]will somone plz help me

item.title: Help me plz
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

alright to make it so it can one hit kill ect. just go into your item file and find the wepon that you want then go to the right and you should see a hole bunch of numbers. change the numbers to something hi for ea one because thats the bonuses it gives. then compile ect and it should work

item.title: Help me plz
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

uhhh go into item.cfg and change the bonuses
then go into client.java and somewhere in there(i’m sorry, very foggy memory)
it’s like

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4718)) //dharoks axe

then somthin like
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase
else
disconnect = true

somtin like that, ask lescape, he’ll know
